ground_truth.thought: 创建一个带有专业主题的PowerPoint演示文稿并保存它
ground_truth.name: PPT.create_file

origin_prompt.content: 作为一名旅行规划师，我需要为客户整理一份关于不同健康保险计划的旅行医疗覆盖的报告。请从文件 'data_v2/insurance_data/travel_medical_coverage.txt' 中读取数据，并将其加入到一个新的PowerPoint演示文稿中。演示文稿应使用专业主题，并保存在 'outputs/travel_medical_coverage_report.pptx'。此外，我希望在演示文稿中添加一个标题为 '旅行医疗覆盖概览' 的文本页，其中包括从文件中提取的前三个关键点。当前这一步的目标是什么?
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'file_path'的值是什么?

{'text': 'Basic health insurance plans typically cover emergency medical expenses up to $50,000.[SPAN]Advanced health insurance plans offer comprehensive coverage, including medical evacuation and repatriation services up to $500,000.[SPAN]Comparing the two, the advanced plan includes additional benefits such as pre-existing condition coverage and 24/7 global assistance.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'text': 'Basic health insurance plans typically cover emergency medical expenses up to $50,000.[SPAN]Advanced health insurance plans offer comprehensive coverage, including medical evacuation and repatriation services up to $500,000.[SPAN]Comparing the two, the advanced plan includes additional benefits such as pre-existing condition coverage and 24/7 global assistance.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
创建一个带有专业主题的PowerPoint演示文稿并保存它
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
